@dav_is_dev @ChrisFerdinandi @vincpa @ianfeather Only if you design and build them with robustness in mind. PWAs use a collection of technologies. It's up to you to use them responsibly. Many of them, like SW, were designed as progressive enhancements specifically to allow you to use them with this in mind.
